name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Principal-level Individual Contributor (IC) with 8 years of experience, I excel in full-stack development and cloud services, specializing in **PHP**, **Java**, **C#**, and **.NET** technologies. My expertise includes building high-performance applications using **ReactJS**, **AngularJS**, **NodeJS**, and **TypeScript**, along with extensive experience deploying solutions in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** environments, including services like **EC2**, **ECS**, **S3**, **SQS**, and **IAM**. I have a proven track record of enhancing application observability and automation with tools like **Grafana**, **Datadog**, **New Relic**, and **Terraform**. 

Additionally, my background includes developing enterprise-grade platforms that leverage AI for automation and predictive analytics, supported by sound knowledge of compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am skilled in architecting microservices and event-driven systems with a strong focus on CI/CD automation, ensuring robust and secure delivery of software solutions aligned with industry standards.
